scripts.generate: buf mod update && shx cp buf.yaml buf.lock protocol && buf generate
scripts.replace:enum: replace-in-files --string="export enum " --replacement="export declare const enum " out/**/*.ts
scripts.replace: yarpm run replace:enum && yarpm run replace:Uint8Array
scripts.move: shx rm -rf root/@types/tronweb/protocol && shx mv out/ root/@types/tronweb/protocol/
scripts.build: yarpm run clean && yarpm run submodule && yarpm run generate && yarpm run replace && yarpm run rename && yarpm run move
